sub_title: Concert pianist, teacher, author and Artistic Director
summary:
Artistic Director of KyG Productions. KyG spreads awareness about classical and contemporary Latin American music and art & Provides diversion and inspiration live and online through conventional and innovative concert formulas, CDs, books and visual art based merchandise in the broadest sense!
(Mainly own and KyG affiliates)

KyG CONCERT FORMULAS include

■ AROUND THE WORLD ON TWO PIANOS
- Latinissimo! A Latin American exercise in excellence 
- East Indies-West Indies: Exotic sounds from faraway places: Cuba, Indonesia and more…
- Cuban Classical & Jazz: Sizzling Cuban chemistry

■ ARIOSO:
Gustavo Corrales Romero's exciting piano trio project featuring modern classical arrangements of Cuban golden oldies.

■ TO HEAR A PAINTING, TO SEE THE MUSIC:
Piano Recital-Lecture-Powerpoint journey featuring Cuban composers and tantalizing parallels with Cuban art, from the 19th century to today.

■ MORE on www.gustavocorralesromero.com
_____________________________________________________________________________________

IT'S ALL KyG Wall Art & Merchandise currently available worldwide (best in the USA):
■ VISIT www.itsallkyg.com | www.kygproductions.com
■ OR GO DIRECTLY TO https://www.zazzle.com/store/itsallkyg
_____________________________________________________________________________________

■ MISSION & PART BIO
Gustavo Corrales Romero has been promoting ‘the other sound of Latin America’ for years, to acquaint people (who only know Latin American popular music) with a 200+year range of Latin American (modern) classical and contemporary compositions, including his own. Audiences invariably express delight and gratitude.

Well-informed about Cuban art and boasting personal relationships with Cuban composers further equips Corrales to introduce audiences to the other side of Latin American culture. Also a writer, he produces CDs, books and concerts through KyG Productions, the company founded with his wife. After CDs PALIMPSESTO (Cuban piano) and FRESCO (Latin American piano), next up: ARIOSO (piano trio arrangements of Cuban songs).

Corrales was trained (age 7-24) as a classical concert pianist in Cuba and at the Tchaikovsky Conservatory in Moscow, has a master’s degree in music, 30+ years of international festival and concert experience and a vast repertoire. Performances are never the same.

profile_positions.description:
.
www.kygproductions.com

KyG (Kah-ee-Hih) stands for Karen and Gustavo in Spanish.

The other half is
Karen D. Russel de Corrales (also on LinkedIn)
• Managing Director
• Management, event organization, logistics, administration, webmaster, creative content & design, translation, marketing, video production & editing.
• Writer, composer, pianist.

My role:
• Concert pianist, writer, composer/musical arranger, visual artist, photographer.
• Co-management, content, creative design, translation, video production.

• Corrales Concerts 1999-2011 (informal organizational format).
• V.O.F. KyG Productions as of 16 August 2011.
